# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(R.matlab)
```

# Loading in Data

```{r}
behavior_m <- readMat(here::here("data/superchris_BM.mat"))
ensemble_m <- readMat(here::here("data/superchris_EM_onlyspikes_c.mat"))
```

# Cleaning Data

```{r}
em <- data.frame(ensemble_m[1])
bm <- data.frame(behavior_m[1]) 
col_names <- data.frame(behavior_m[2])

em
```

# Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
bm %>% 
  select(behavMatrix.1, behavMatrix.2, behavMatrix.14) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = behavMatrix.1, y = behavMatrix.14)) + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_line(aes(x = behavMatrix.1, y = behavMatrix.2), colour = "Red")
```
